name: Easy 8
description:
WELCOME TO EASY 8 - 2D TANK SHOOTER

CONTROLS:

W : MOVE UP

A : MOVE LEFT

S : MOVE DOWN

D : MOVE RIGHT

SPACEBAR : SHOOT

RIGHT ARROW KEY : ROTATE TANK RIGHT (CLOCKWISE)

LEFT ARROW KEY : ROTATE TANK LEFT (COUNTER-CLOCKWISE)

Created By: Chase Miller

https://github.com/tommmy-bahama
